item.description: this course 083 A few paragraphs or items in an unordered list immediately following the heading and describing why you decided to take this course and what you expected to learn. The related textual content should be between 250 and 500 words combined. There are many who pretend to despise and belittle that which is beyond their reach.

item.title: Code Demo
item.description: Simple plot with matplotlib import matplotlib.pyplot as plt import numpy as np data = np.random(5,2) data = np.random.rand(5,2) # Plot the random data plt.plot(data) plt.show()
